articles.description: The WPI inflation has fallen into negative for the first time since July 2020.
articles.content: India’s wholesale-price base inflation (WPI) for the first time in almost three years turned negative in April, as overall prices eased. The WPI inflation fell -0.92 per cent in April, as compared to… [+1106 chars]
